review: We bought a Fire TV Stick because we are Prime members and so glad we did. Couldn't afford a smart TV and now we have one. Easy set up we just need to reconfigure our surround sound. The price is right and you can use your phone as a second remote. It's awesome and there are more choices than over priced cable where you have things you never use. Highly recommended you won't be sorry. Amazon rocks.
